title: Abstract Science-Themed Wall Clock ? Digital Printed Wooden Decor, 12x16 Inch, (Without Battery)
description:
Ignite curiosity and style with this eye-catching Digital Printed Wooden Wall Clock, designed to merge science and art in a bold, modern format. Measuring 12x16 inches, this rectangular clock showcases a vivid abstract design with splashes of red, blue, yellow, and white, along with illustrations of a human brain and scientific elements?making it a standout piece for any room.

Crafted from durable wood, the clock features gold-colored numerals and hands for a sleek, elegant contrast. Its battery-free operation ensures low maintenance, and the hook-mounted design allows for quick and secure wall installation.

Perfect for classrooms, study areas, creative studios, or contemporary living spaces, this clock is more than just a timepiece?it?s a conversation starter that celebrates intellect, imagination, and design.
